text:
The XLS2CSV sample (and this modification http://osdir.com/ml/user-poi.apache.org/2010-01/msg00110.html) are useful.

Compile them as part of the library instead of leaving them as samples.
creator: opticyclic@gmail.com
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text:
There is a POI-Example package that we publish and it contains this sample, see http://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.poi/poi-examples/3.15-beta2

Therefore I am closing this as WORKSFORME.
